subject: AI & Agents
title: Your Data Is the Product
description: A micro-lesson that makes Your Data Is the Product usable.

hook.text: Every search, click, and scroll trains an AI model. Your behavior is the raw material.

buildup.text: Companies collect vast datasets of user behavior to train recommendation and ad-targeting models.

discovery.text: Terms of service agreements grant broad data usage rights that few people read.

twist.text: Your data doesn't just improve your experience â€” it trains models that affect millions of others.

climax.text: GDPR and other regulations try to give users control, but enforcement is inconsistent.

punchline.text: Free apps aren't free. You pay with your data.

quiz.question: How do companies use your behavioral data?
options: To train AI models for recommendations and ad targeting
Only to improve your personal experience
